description: A survey of medical treatment available under Britain's National Health Scheme. Some of the medical attention which can be obtained on the advice of the general practitioner. Includes specialised services in pre-natal and post-natal care; ophthalmic, dental and orthopaedic treatment; chest clinics; mental health; geriatrics and rehabilitation centres.
